## ProgramBuilder.faceForward() method

Same as faceForward builtin function in WGSL, only valid for WebGPU device

**Signature:**

```typescript
faceForward(x: PBShaderExp, y: PBShaderExp, z: PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```
